trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_SEQ_00<tab>Knolexia wishes to show you her immense gratitude.

TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_SEQ_01<tab>Knolexia wishes to present you with a gift, but first asks that you bring her three bottles of djigga blood. Do so by using the bottles she provided you with on weakened swollen djiggas.
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_SEQ_02<tab>You have procured the three bottles of djigga blood Knolexia requested. Deliver them to her at Little Solace.

TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_SEQ_03<tab>Using the djigga blood you have provided, Knolexia has created for you an enchanted garment to serve as a token of her appreciation. However, while you appreciate the gesture, it may take some time to get used to the idea of wearing vilekin blood as a good-luck charm.
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_TODO_00<tab>Use the empty blood bottles on weakened djiggas.
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the djigga blood to Knolexia.
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_KNOLEXIA_000_000<tab>This one wishes to thank the adventuring one. Adventuring one saved the elder one.

TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_KNOLEXIA_000_001<tab>But this one must ask a favor first. Will adventuring one bring three bottles of fresh blood? Is morbid favor, this one knows. But must have fresh blood from vile ones known as djiggas.
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_KNOLEXIA_000_002<tab>Here, adventuring one take blood bottles. Use on almost dead vile ones to take fresh blood.
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_TODO_000_010<tab>Obtain three vials of fresh blood from djiggas. (Use the empty vial on a djigga with only 25% or less HP remaining.)
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_KNOLEXIA_000_020<tab>Did adventuring one bring blood from vile ones?
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_KNOLEXIA_000_021<tab>This goes here, and that there... Then stitch like this... Then put that together...
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_KNOLEXIA_000_022<tab>Done! This one has made a garment for adventuring one.
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_KNOLEXIA_000_023<tab>Is enchanted garment. Will protect adventuring one from scary ones.
TEXT_GAIUSA403_00745_KNOLEXIA_000_024<tab>And is token of this one's thanks. These ones owe adventuring one many, many thanks.
